titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the death of that worthy gentleman, Mr. Peter Pretty the son of a divine. From his sister
titleStmt.author: Pretty, Miss.

publicationStmt.date: printed in year M DC LXXIX. [1679]

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Sweet brother! sweet! tho dead, as dear to me".
Stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
